item.title: PROJECTS: Hardware Inventory Sales
item.description: An inventory and 'pos-like' desktop application built using Java Swing (Java v22) and FlatLaf. This is a dummy client that uses a MySQL database directly in it. Built as the final project of 1st year 1st semester. This was my first time learning Java. Has persistent authentication
item.content:encoded:
An inventory and 'pos-like' desktop application built using Java Swing (Java v22) and FlatLaf. This is a dummy client that uses a MySQL database directly in it. Built as the final project of 1st year 1st semester. This was my first time learning Java. Has persistent authentication

Go to link
item.author: Aaron Ragudos

item.title: PROJECTS: KomPeter Computer Parts & Accessories
item.description: Another inventory and point-of-sale system built using Java Swing and FlatLaf. This is a dummy client that uses SQLite, Built as the final project for Object-Oriented Programming in 2nd year 1st semester. Has persistent authentication.
item.content:encoded:
Another inventory and point-of-sale system built using Java Swing and FlatLaf. This is a dummy client that uses SQLite, Built as the final project for Object-Oriented Programming in 2nd year 1st semester. Has persistent authentication.

Go to link
item.author: Aaron Ragudos

item.title: PROJECTS: Terminal Point of Sale System
item.description: A Point of Sale in a terminal built using C++ and CMake. This was my first time learning C++. Built as the final project of 1st year 1st semester. Individual order viewing and editing and adding drink add-ons weren't finished.
item.content:encoded:
A Point of Sale in a terminal built using C++ and CMake. This was my first time learning C++. Built as the final project of 1st year 1st semester. Individual order viewing and editing and adding drink add-ons weren't finished.
